We show here that database normalization follows as a consequence ( or special case , or by - product ) of the Minimum Message Length ( MML ) principle of machine learning and inductive inference .In other words , someone ( previously ) oblivious to database normalization but well - versed in MML could examine a database and - using MML considerations alone - normalise it , and even discover the notion of attribute inheritance .
